definition: to plan in advance (idiom)/a card up one's sleeve/forewarned is forearmed
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
like a hot knife through butter (idiom)/with irresistible force
Xinzhu or Hsinchu city in northern Taiwan, noted for high tech industries/Xinzhu or Hsinchu county in northwest Taiwan
moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc
see 胸有成竹[xiong1 you3 cheng2 zhu2]

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 测定了龙竹竹材在不同热压温度下干燥时的温度分布。

sentences.english: Did they deplete the bamboo resources themselves?
sentences.chinese: 是巨猿耗尽竹资源的吗？

sentences.english: China, Chongqing travel, Yongchuan Bamboo-Sea, roadside puppies. Photo by KaKa.
sentences.chinese: 中国，重庆旅游，永川竹海路，卡卡照片。

sentences.english: Compared with the bamboo in the south, the bamboo in the north is always of less charm.
sentences.chinese: 北方竹和南方竹相比，总觉得缺少一种灵气。

sentences.english: Compared with the bamboo in the south, the bamboo in the north is always of less charm.
sentences.chinese: 北方竹和南方竹相比，总觉得缺少一种灵气。

sentences.english: When night fell, the duckling raiser would make his home in a tent-like bamboo shed.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，养鸭人便搭起一个竹帐篷当自己家了。

sentences.english: And in this case a man got hooked on a bamboo sleeping mat.
sentences.chinese: 而这里，这个男人觉得一个竹凉席是很不同的。

sentences.english: The vernacular bamboo construction techniques are attributed to migrants from rural Guanxi.
sentences.chinese: 乡土风格的竹结构建造技术是移植于广西的乡村。

sentences.english: The soil hydrology effect of Pseudosasa amabilis var.
sentences.chinese: 对福建茶秆竹的土壤水文效应进行了分析研究。

sentences.english: "Bamboo Willow" have no relation with bamboo at all but were so named for the remarkable growth properties.
sentences.chinese: 以其向高向上的生长形态酷似竹子，被命名为竹柳。

sentences.english: My bamboo brush paints the moon by holding many a star.
sentences.chinese: 我的竹刷子通过举着很多星星的方式来画月亮。

sentences.english: If you lie on a bamboo bed in summer, you will feel cool, comfortable and sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 夏天如果你躺在竹床上，你会感到凉爽，舒适，宁静。

sentences.english: Bamboo char fiber is a kind of lower strength and lower elongation fiber, it has higher moisture regain.
sentences.chinese: 竹炭纤维是一种低强低伸型纤维，具有较高的回潮率。

sentences.english: Bamboo products design, Zhuyun series on furniture and furnishing.
sentences.chinese: “竹韵新语”系列，竹家具和竹家居用品设计。

sentences.english: Bamboo products design, Zhuyun series on furniture and furnishing.
sentences.chinese: “竹韵新语”系列，竹家具和竹家居用品设计。

sentences.english: We have been engaged in this business for the past 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 敝公司从事这个亦竹已经有廿年的经验。

definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)
